entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0194.10621] us-gaap:StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedCompensationForfeited has a value of -44,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value when used with the common stock [Member]. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly for this assertion and, after considering the appropriateness of the input, if incorrect, input the amount as a positive (i.e., absolute) value and provide a negated label.
The properties of this us-gaap:StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedCompensationForfeited fact are: Period :2023-01-01 to 2023-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis=us-gaap:CommonStockMember Unit : shares Rule Element Id:10621 Rule version: 26.0.9 - rhe-20241231.htm 4230

property.name: label
property.value: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0194.10621] us-gaap:StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedCompensationForfeited has a value of -25,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value when used with the common stock [Member]. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly for this assertion and, after considering the appropriateness of the input, if incorrect, input the amount as a positive (i.e., absolute) value and provide a negated label.
The properties of this us-gaap:StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedCompensationForfeited fact are: Period :2024-01-01 to 2024-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis=us-gaap:CommonStockMember Unit : shares Rule Element Id:10621 Rule version: 26.0.9 - rhe-20241231.htm 4503

property.name: label
property.value: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
